fn.p: Citation Schoen A, Lau S, Verbruggen P, Weber F. 2020. Elongin C contributes to RNA polymerase II degradation by the interferon antagonist NSs of La Crosse orthobunyavirus. J Virol 94:e02134-19. https://doi.org/10.1128/JVI.02134-19.
